item.title: Matplotlib 2.0 or "One does not simply change all the defaults"
item.description:
Description

For the first time in over a decade, matplotlib is changing the default styles. This talk will provide a high-level overview of the changes, the reasoning behind the changes, and the challenges along the way.
item.dc:creator: Thomas A Caswell

item.title: State of the library: matplotlib
item.description:
Description

A short summary of recent developments of matplotlib and how to write re-usable plotting code.
item.dc:creator: Thomas A Caswell
